archimate:Principle.name: <<ELAP:ArchitecturePrinciple>> Subsidiarity and proportionality
archimate:Principle.documentation: http://data.europa.eu/2sa/elap/subsidiarity-and-proportionality The"subsidiarity principle"requires EU decisions to be taken as closely as possible by the citizen. Rationale The proportionality principle limits EU actions to what is necessary to achieve the objectives of the Treaties. Principle Source Subsidiarity and proportionality Underlying Principle (1) of the European Interoperability Framework (EIF)
